content: I'm planning to serve the crab cakes with a side of Garlic Butter Shrimp, which I've made several times in the past month. I've found that the combination of the rich, buttery flavors with the bright, citrusy notes really complements the crab cakes nicely. Do you have any suggestions for other sides that would pair well with the crab cakes and Garlic Butter Shrimp?
